entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Chibougamau
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 8:25 PM EST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -21.3°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Chibougamau Chapais Airport 10:47 PM EST Thursday 26 January 2023
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -21.3°C
Pressure: 100.8 kPa
Visibility: 9.7 km
Humidity: 77 %
Wind Chill: -30
Dewpoint: -24.2°C
Wind: WNW 13 km/h gust 30 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Thursday night: Light snow. Low minus 29.
entry.summary: Light snow ending this evening then clearing. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light overnight. Low minus 29. Wind chill minus 22 this evening and minus 39 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: Mainly sunny. High minus 16.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 16. Wind chill minus 40 in the morning and minus 24 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Flurries. Temperature rising to minus 6 by morning.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Flurries beginning late in the evening. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming south 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the evening. Temperature rising to minus 6 by morning. Wind chill minus 24 in the evening and minus 14 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Thursday 26 January 2023
